channel.title: Need Help So much with npc drops
channel.description: This is really difficult for me lol look at this pic and plz tell how to add npc drops [img]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/231/helput.png[/img]

item.title: Need Help So much with npc drops
item.dc:creator: @xparty-hatszx xparty-hatszx
item.description:
@xparty-hatszx wrote:

i’ll spoonfeed the baby :mad: :mad:

Go down to the NPC you want using ctrl + f

you’ll see there…
for general graardor

//General Graardor npcdrop = 1115 995 15000000 1 npcdrop = 1115 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1115 35 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 667 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 2402 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 746 1 1

now. the 1115 is the NPC id.

the second number on each line is the item id

the third number on each is the ammount of that item

the last number is the drop rate. like this 1/100 or 10/100 or even 100/100 but DO NOT PUT 100/100 IN!! PUT IT IN AS 1, 10, or 100

EDIT: THIS IS FOR DELTA. IF IT AINT DELTA… I CAN’T HELP YOU

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help So much with npc drops

item.title: Need Help So much with npc drops
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

[quote=“ServerCr4eat3r, post:3, topic:382049”][quote author=Woopzpkedu link=topic=477850.msg3496776#msg3496776 date=1297380297]
stop posting multiple topics about this crap all u need is comon sence to figure this (u obviosly dont have any)
[/quote] no need to flame i just need help… if u have so much common sense why dont u tell me how to do this ?[/quote]hawe u even attempted at it or do u just post it here when ur stuck and hope some 1 comes and spoonfeeds u?
